about.title: About Me
about.content:
I studied Applied Information Science at PXL University College and currently work as a full-stack .NET developer, with a strong preference for frontend development. I'm always looking to grow as a developer, and I have a special interest in topics like DevOps and software architecture.

Something I truly enjoy is mentoring. Whether I'm supporting colleagues or guiding interns, I find it rewarding to share knowledge and help others develop their skills.

In my free time, I like playing video games and going camping. When I'm outdoors, I really enjoy kayaking, it's a great way to relax and enjoy nature.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: A comprehensive overview of the technologies and tools I work with, organized by category and proficiency level.

frontend.angular: Modern TypeScript-based web application framework for building dynamic single-page applications
frontend.typescript: Typed superset of JavaScript that adds static type definitions for better development experience
frontend.html5: Latest markup language standard for structuring and presenting content on the web
frontend.css3: Advanced styling language for designing beautiful and responsive web interfaces
frontend.sass: Powerful CSS preprocessor with nested syntax, variables, and mixins for maintainable stylesheets
frontend.rxjs: Reactive programming library using observables for handling asynchronous data streams

backend.dotnet: Cross-platform framework for building modern web, cloud, and desktop applications with C#
backend.entityframework: Object-relational mapping (ORM) framework that enables .NET developers to work with databases using objects
backend.cosmosdb: Globally distributed, multi-model database service from Microsoft Azure with guaranteed low latency
backend.restapis: Architectural style for designing networked applications using standard HTTP methods and stateless communication
backend.graphql: Query language and runtime for APIs using HotChocolate, providing flexible and efficient data fetching
backend.martendb: PostgreSQL document database and event store library for .NET applications

cloud.aks: Managed Kubernetes container orchestration service in Azure for deploying and scaling containerized applications
cloud.containerApps: Serverless container platform for hosting microservices and APIs without managing infrastructure
cloud.logicApps: Workflow automation platform for integrating applications, data, and services across organizations
cloud.functions: Serverless compute service for running event-driven code without provisioning or managing servers
cloud.entraId: Comprehensive identity and access management service (formerly Azure Active Directory)
cloud.devOpsPipelines: Continuous integration and deployment automation for building, testing, and deploying applications
cloud.applicationInsights: Application performance monitoring service for detecting and diagnosing issues in live applications

testing.jest: Delightful JavaScript testing framework with built-in snapshot testing and mocking capabilities
testing.cypress: Fast and reliable end-to-end testing framework for modern web applications
testing.karma: Test runner for JavaScript that executes tests in real browsers, primarily used with Angular
testing.nunit: Popular unit-testing framework for all .NET languages with rich assertion library

education.title: Applied Information Science
education.description: Bachelor's degree in Applied Information Science with focus on software development and information systems.

work.title: Full-Stack .NET Developer
work.description: Working as a full-stack .NET developer, building enterprise applications and web solutions.
